LanguageData.DMS_Bullet_DragoonRocket.label: rocket
LanguageData.DMS_Bullet_DragoonShotgun.label: canister darts
LanguageData.DMS_Dragoon_LMG.label: Dragoon LMG
LanguageData.DMS_Dragoon_LMG.description: A light machine gun relative to the size of a Dragoon, but for humans it is basically a deadly large-caliber autocannon, using a heavy drum to provide sufficient firepower continuity and suppression capabilities.
LanguageData.DMS_Dragoon_LMG.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_Dragoon_LMG.tools.barrel.label: barrel
LanguageData.DMS_Dragoon_LMG.verbs.Verb_Shoot.label: Dragoon LMG
LanguageData.DMS_Dragoon_Shotgun.label: Dragoon Shotgun
LanguageData.DMS_Dragoon_Shotgun.description: A heavy-duty semi-automatic shotgun code-named "Dragon", this equipment was designed to provide dragoons with decent firepower in close range without taking up too much weight. it's capable of firing a white phosphorous canister called Dragonbreath to incinerate the enemy.
LanguageData.DMS_Dragoon_Shotgun.tools.stock.label: stock
LanguageData.DMS_Dragoon_Shotgun.tools.barrel.label: barrel
